InputDeviceInfo.summary: The InputDeviceInfo interface of the {{domxref("Media Capture and Streams API", "", "", "nocode")}} gives access to the capabilities of the input device that it represents.

remarks.para: InputDeviceInfo objects are returned by if the returned device is an audio or video input device.

InputDeviceInfoGetCapabilities.summary: The getCapabilities() method of the interface returns a MediaTrackCapabilities object describing the primary audio or video track of the device's .

remarks.para: -, which also return a MediaTrackCapabilities object.

InputDeviceInfoGetCapabilities.returns:
A MediaTrackCapabilities object which specifies the value or range of values which are supported for each of the user agent's supported constrainable properties. It is required to return identical information as returned by calling getCapabilities() on the first of the same kind as this device (video or audio) in the MediaStream returned by getUserMedia({ deviceId: deviceInfo.deviceId }). See for a list of commonly supported properties and their types.
NOTEIf the user has not granted permission to access the input device an empty object will be returned.
